PRODUCTNUM JOIN PRODUCTOPTION D ON A.OPTIONNUM = D.NUM WHERE A.NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert:
SELECT PAYMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PAYMENT (NUM, ORDERDATE, TOTALPRICE, METHOD, MEMBERID) VALUES (#{num}, SYSDATE, #{totalPrice}, #{method}, #{memberId})

INSERT INTO PAIDPRODUCT (NUM, PERPRICE, AMOUNT, PAYMENTNUM, PRODUCTNUM, OPTIONNUM, SHIPMENTSTATUS, ROASTERYNUM) VALUES (PAIDPRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{perPrice}, #{amount}, #{paymentNum}, #{productNum}, #{optionNum}, 0, #{roasteryNum})
INSERT INTO DELIVERY (NUM, RECIPIENT, ADDRESS, RECIPIENTPHONE, MEMO, PAYMENTNUM) VALUES (DELIVERY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{recipient}, #{address}, #{recipientPhone}, #{memo}, #{paymentNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PURCHASE = PURCHASE + 1 WHERE NUM = #{productNum}
mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM, A.ORDERDATE, A.TOTALPRICE, B.NUM AS PAIDPRODUCTNUM, B.PAYMENTNUM, B.PERPRICE, B.AMOUNT, B.PRODUCTNUM, B.DELIVERYCOMPANY, B.SHIPMENTNUM, B.SHIPMENTSTATUS, C.OPTIONNAME, C.ADDPRICE, D.NAME, D.ROASTERYNAME, D.PRICE, E.FILENAME FROM PAYMENT A JOIN PAIDPRODUCT B ON A.NUM = B.PAYMENTNUM JOIN PRODUCTOPTION C ON B.OPTIONNUM = C.NUM JOIN PRODUCT D ON B.PRODUCTNUM = D.NUM JOIN PRODUCTFILE E ON D.NUM = E.PRODUCTNUM WHERE A.NUM IN ((SELECT NUM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, F.* FROM (SELECT NUM FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBERID = #{id} ORDER BY NUM DESC) F) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow})) ORDER BY A.NUM DESC, ORDERDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(NUM) FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBERID = #{id}

SELECT A.NUM, A.ORDERDATE, A.TOTALPRICE, A.METHOD, B.PERPRICE, B.AMOUNT, B.PRODUCTNUM, B.DELIVERYCOMPANY, B.SHIPMENTNUM, B.SHIPMENTSTATUS, C.OPTIONNAME, C.ADDPRICE, D.NAME, D.ROASTERYNAME, D.PRICE, D.DELIVERYFEE, D.FREEDELIVERY, E.FILENAME, F.RECIPIENT, F.ADDRESS, F.RECIPIENTPHONE, F.MEMO FROM PAYMENT A JOIN PAIDPRODUCT B ON A.NUM = B.PAYMENTNUM JOIN PRODUCTOPTION C ON B.OPTIONNUM = C.NUM JOIN PRODUCT D ON B.PRODUCTNUM = D.NUM JOIN PRODUCTFILE E ON D.NUM = E.PRODUCTNUM JOIN DELIVERY F ON A.NUM = F.PAYMENTNUM WHERE A.NUM = #{num}

SELECT A.NUM AS PAYMENTNUM, A.ORDERDATE, B.NUM, B.AMOUNT, B.PERPRICE, C.NAME, C.ROASTERYNAME, C.PRICE, D.FILENAME, E.OPTIONNAME, E.ADDPRICE, F.RECIPIENT, F.ADDRESS, F.RECIPIENTPHONE, F.MEMO FROM PAYMENT A JOIN PAIDPRODUCT B ON A.NUM = B.PAYMENTNUM JOIN PRODUCT C ON B.PRODUCTNUM = C.NUM JOIN PRODUCTFILE D ON C.NUM = D.PRODUCTNUM JOIN PRODUCTOPTION E ON B.OPTIONNUM = E.NUM JOIN DELIVERY F ON A.NUM = F.PAYMENTNUM WHERE A.NUM IN ((SELECT NUM FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R, J.* FROM(SELECT DISTINCT G.NUM FROM PAYMENT G JOIN PAIDPRODUCT H ON G.NUM = H.PAYMENTNUM JOIN ROASTERY I ON H.ROASTERYNUM = I.NUM WHERE I.MEMBERID = #{id} ORDER BY G.NUM ASC) J) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow})) AND B.SHIPMENTSTATUS = 0 ORDER BY B.NUM ASC
SELECT COUNT(NUM) FROM(SELECT DISTINCT G.NUM FROM PAYMENT G JOIN PAIDPRODUCT H ON G.NUM = H.PAYMENTNUM JOIN ROASTERY I ON H.ROASTERYNUM = I.NUM WHERE I.MEMBERID = #{id} ORDER BY G.NUM ASC)

SELECT A.NUM AS PAYMENTNUM, A.ORDERDATE, B.RECIPIENT, B.ADDRESS, B.RECIPIENTPHONE, B.MEMO, C.AMOUNT, D.NAME, D.ROASTERYNAME, E.OPTIONNAME, E.ADDPRICE, F.FILENAME FROM PAYMENT A JOIN DELIVERY B ON A.NUM = B.PAYMENTNUM JOIN PAIDPRODUCT C ON A.NUM = C.PAYMENTNUM JOIN PRODUCT D ON C.PRODUCTNUM = D.NUM JOIN PRODUCTOPTION E ON C.OPTIONNUM = E.NUM JOIN PRODUCTFILE F ON D.NUM = F.PRODUCTNUM WHERE C.NUM = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAIDPRODUCT SET DELIVERYCOMPANY = #{deliveryCompany}, SHIPMENTNUM = #{shipmentNum}, SHIPMENTSTATUS = 1 WHERE NUM = #{num}
